author: Alice Sholl
title: Experts say these are the best breakfasts to help you lose weight
text:
There’s plenty of protein in these (Picture: Pexels) Two eggs to be precise – with a tablespoon of chopped onion, 65g of spinach, half a tablespoon of olive oil, and one slice of wholegrain toast. And for the side, 75g of blueberries and raspberries.
Peanut butter on toast Get in. Our. Bellies (Picture: Pexels) This isn’t a lie – a study found that people that ate a little pudding along with their breakfast – some cake, a few squares of chocolate – lost more weight than those who didn’t.
It basically stifles unhealthy food cravings later on in the day.
Bigger cereal How big can you go? (Picture: Pexels) Physically bigger flakes, not bigger portion sizes, as researchers have found that people eat more cereal if the flakes are smaller (because we’re simple creatures).

Whey protein drinks Get your protein on (Picture: Pexels) Protein shakes aren’t a total scam after all, as studies have found that high-protein breakfasts – of which whey protein drinks as well as milk and yoghurt are particularly dense in – aid weight loss.
Oh, and never skip breakfast – but you’ve probably got the gist of that by now.
